1.3.name: wordpress/hebcal-shabbat-times
1.3.description:
Displays Shabbat candle lighting times for a USA zip code in a widget. Candle lighting time information comes from Hebcal.com.

Hebcal.com is a free Jewish calendar and holiday web site. It includes a powerful custom Jewish calendar form that lets you generate a list of Jewish holidays for any year (past, present or future). Also available is a Hebrew date converter, Shabbat candle lighting times and Torah readings, and a page to look up yahrzeits, birthdays and anniversaries.
